You need to modify your /etc/mpd.conf file to point at the directory where your music resides.

/var/log/mpd/mpd.log will tell you if there any errors when sonata connects to mpd and cannot find the music.

No, that should be enough.
Make sure that the user that is running the mpd service has rights to the directory that you are storing your music in.
